tasks.task: Convincing a chicken to come back into its coop.
subtasks: Approach the chicken calmly and coaxingly.
Use a friendly tone of voice while speaking to the chicken.
Create an opening for the chicken to return by standing invitingly.
Guide the chicken towards the coop entrance with gentle movements.

tasks.task: Demonstrating the consequences of escaping during breakfast.
subtasks: Point out the previous mistake of escaping during breakfast.
Explain the rules regarding coop access times.
Repeat the lesson learned to reinforce behavioral expectations.

tasks.task: Instruct a chicken to enter its coop.
Convincing a chicken to return to its coop after an escape.
Guide a chicken back into the coop after an escape.
Calm and guide a chicken back into the coop.
subtasks: Make a welcoming gesture.
Call the chicken's name or say "come here" repeatedly.
Open the coop door for the chicken to enter.
Stand aside the door to let the chicken pass.
Allow the chicken to perch or eat once inside.

tasks.task: Train a chicken not to escape during mealtime.
subtasks: Monitor the chicken’s proximity to the coop during feeding.
Close the coop entrance when necessary.
Redirect the chicken’s attention if it tries to leave.

tasks.task: Guide a chicken back into the coop after an escape.
subtasks: Walk toward the chicken.
Call the chicken towards the entrance ("Come here") multiple times.
Position near the open door to facilitate entry.

tasks.task: Return a chicken to its coop after a breakout.
Approach the bird and guide it back into the coop.
subtasks: Walk toward the chicken.
Call the chicken towards the door with commands like "come here."
Once in range, open the door if necessary (though in this case, the door is presumably open).
Allow the chicken to enter.

tasks.task: **MAINTASK: Convincing a chicken to return to its coop after an escape.**
